title: Homogeneity Diminishing Returns to Scale
body:
Since you give away love the Tanks need some!

Where do we , the players and the developers, see the "official" [popularity](http://ask.fm/RiotFeralPony/answers/135309156102) charts for the Top ten champions through all maps, all time, all queues The Best thing I got is [here](http://www.lolking.net/charts?region=all&type=champion-popularity&range=monthly&map=sr&queue=normal)

Health and AD [should](http://ask.fm/RiotFeralPony/answers/135716612870) be on par

Nonetheless Money!!!
It costs the same or even more to Double your Health and to Double your Attack Damage Nonetheless DPS earn the Same Amount of Gold Twice as Fast
DPS doubles twice as fast as Health!

We also have an Issue why do DPS players buy AD or AP but Tanks Armour and Magic Resistance.
I personally have Armour +9% EH and MR +12% EH Runes for Tanks
Also we have an Issue of a long Forgotten Stat Penetration

Attack Damage is Prefered over PEN
8.5 / 72 = +11.8%
12 / 116 = +10%
